The study population approximately 80 smoker upcoming lung resection surgery schedule Massachusetts General Hospital ( MGH ) Boston . A patient consider eligible intervention control group 1 ) schedule lung resection surgery either lung cancer diagnosis potential lung cancer diagnosis , 2 ) cigarette past 2 week , 3 ) willing make pre-surgical quit attempt . Patients exclude control group 1 ) non-English speaking , 2 ) determine medically ineligible surgeon/oncologist , 3 ) suffer psychosis dementia 4 ) currently Varenicline Varenicline 3 week , 5 ) otherwise unable participate intervention . Patients exclude intervention group 1 ) non-English speaking , 2 ) determine medically ineligible surgeon , 3 ) suffer psychosis dementia 4 ) take Varenicline longer three week 5 ) take Bupropion ( smoke cessation purpose ) three week , 6 ) otherwise unable participate intervention .
